parsed.explanation: Corrections were made to fix XML validity issues and improve readability: escaped unescaped ampersands in text nodes (& to &) for proper XML parsing; replaced mis-encoded German umlauts and symbols (B√ächer → Bücher, etc.); replaced mis-encoded 'Prei√ü' with the proper 'Preis'; standardized bibliographic format markers (4t√≤, 8v√≤) with standard forms (4to, 8vo); ensured the first title's ampersand is escaped.
